Model

Interface IAgeCalculator


  • public interface IAgeCalculator
    The Age Calculator has only three functions. These are: your current age, the time left until you're X years old, and the time left until your birthday.
    Author:
    Octavio Maia

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int age(java.time.LocalDate birthday)
      Calculates your current age.
      static java.time.Period timeUntilAge(java.time.LocalDate birthday, int age)
      Calculates the time left until you're a certain age.
      static java.time.Period timeUntilBirthday(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Calculates the time left until your next birthday.

    • Method Detail

      • age

        static int age(java.time.LocalDate birthday)
        Calculates your current age.
        Parameters:
        birthday - LocalDate representing your birthday.
        Returns:
        Integer representing your age in years.

      • timeUntilAge

        static java.time.Period timeUntilAge(java.time.LocalDate birthday,
                                     int age)
        Calculates the time left until you're a certain age.
        Parameters:
        birthday - LocalDate representing your birthday.
        age - Integer representing the age you want to be.
        Returns:
        Period representing the time left until you're X years old.

      • timeUntilBirthday

        static java.time.Period timeUntilBirthday(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Calculates the time left until your next birthday.
        Parameters:
        date - LocalDate representing your birthday.
        Returns:
        Period representing the time left until your next birthday.
